籤詩版本二:
Ua hoʻomanawanui ʻo Qin Jun i ke ola conservative a ua paʻa ʻo ia ʻaʻole e hana hewa.
A hiki i ka wā e hoʻoikaika mālie ai kekahi, e ulu hou nā lālā make a me nā lāʻau kahiko i nā pua.
詩意:
Ua like kēia hexagram me nā pua ulu lāʻau make.
Loaʻa i nā mea a pau kona holomua ponoʻī.
解曰: E noho mālie a noho mālie. Hoʻokō ʻia nā mea. Inā neʻe, nui nā pōʻino. ʻAʻohe hewa i ka hāmau.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Weishui lawaiʻa
I ka moʻokūʻauhau Zhou, ua hānau ʻia ʻo Jiang Shang, i kapa ʻia ʻo Ziya, ma Ji (he kamaʻāina ʻo Xuzhou, East China Sea), a ʻo Fei Xiong kona inoa Taoist. Ua hāʻawi ʻia ka inoa ʻo Zai Lu (inoa wahi), no laila ua kapa ʻia ʻo ia ʻo Lu Wang.
I mea e pakele ai i nā manawa pilikia o ka Mōʻī Zhou o Shang Dynasty, noho ʻo Jiang Ziya ma ka wai o ke Kai Kina Hikina a lawaiʻa i ka muliwai ʻo Weishui.
Pololei ka makau, ʻoiai, ʻaʻole lawaiʻa kona puʻuwai, akā, ʻo kona manaʻo nui e lilo i kuhina nui.
Ua lohe ʻo King Wen he naʻauao ʻo ia a hoʻolimalima iā ia i kumu (kuhina nui). (He kanawalu makahiki o Jiang Ziya ia manawa)
Ma hope mai, ua kūʻē ka Mōʻī Wu o Zhou i ka Mōʻī Zhou o Shang, ua luku i ka mōʻī Shang, a ua hoʻokumu i ka mōʻī Zhou. Ua kapa ʻo King Wu iā Jiang Ziya Shangfu. ʻO ke keiki a Feng Jiang, ʻo Ding Gong, i lilo i Marquis o Qi.
(He ʻōlelo hoʻohālikelike kēia moʻolelo: e kali i ka manawa kūpono, e kali a loaʻa kahi manawa hoʻāla, a laila hoʻomaka ka hoʻomohala ʻana.)
聖意: Laki maikai i ka ohana, ka home, a me ka waiwai, a hiki i ka manawa, e holopono ka hana, ina i hanau ke kaikamahine ma Liujia, paa ka poe hele wawae i na kihapai, paa na enuhe kilika, paakiki ka loaa ana o na holoholona eono, maikai. laki i ka hihia, ka neʻe ʻana, ka mālama ʻole, ka waiwai nalowale, ka maʻi, a me ka pōmaikaʻi.
第X籤: He kanahakumamāono lanakila ma ka hailona
